  • Introduction

    I always been a addicted to technologies so i quickly be involved in web development when i discover it at MMI training.

    My expertise comports the creation of ergonomic and modern applications without forgetting communication processes. I also use some Graphic (PAO) and animated elements to bring more dynamism to the web products.

    I will also apply my technicals languages skills to build tailor-made back offices with frameworks and CMS.

  • Expertise

    • Back end dev

      Development with PHP and CMS

      I apply my skills in web integration with CMS like Wordpress or Prestashop. I build websites with Symfony 3 & 4 Php framework, MySQL and AJAX asynchronous methods. For finish i know how create a VM (DNS, Ubuntu, Apache).

    • Front end dev

      Integration and UX design

      I know well about HTML5|CSS3|JS and frameworks like bootstrap. I use SASS prepocessor to get faster. With javascript and libraries ( VueJs and jQuery), good practices and workflows like Webpack i can produce fast loading web app's.

    • Graphic design

      Graphic and Motion design

      Adobe XD and InVision Studio allow me to conceive User experience on my web creations. Also i use Adobe PAO softwares to create graphic elements and After effect (Lottie js) to generate modern animations in SVG.

    • Communication and project management

      Communication & projects methods

      Applying UX process and analytics tools on web products to catch users behaviours.
      Also my new formation going to give me project management skills (Agile and V managements methods).

Portfolio

Arinella

July 2018 - Today

Website for a related person which present a Corsica villa. The options available:

  • A home slider highlighting different views of the villa
  • An accordion (jQuery UI) showing the different devices
  • A dynamic images gallery able to be managed in administration page
  • The admin part is protected by a password system and keeped alive with PHP server session. We can manage admin accounts and images in database with the CRUD system (create, read, update, delete).
  • A mailing system based on the PHP plugin PHPMailer and Google SMTP server.
See the project

Alt2crous

March 2018 - April 2018

We built a website during a school team work which is aimed at finding restaurants around Studying places in the Grenoble city.

Website administration user interface allow to create, read, update, delete (CRUD) in a restaurants database. After an algorithm find a restaurant with price and location settings. Try it, there is some good deals ! (I find he mobile version nice check it) Technologies used : PHP / MySQL / JS / HTML5 / CSS3.

See the project

Les plantes urbaines

November 2018 - January 2019

According to an other students mission statement we create a wordpress customizable theme. The options we add are :

  • Archive pages for all post or for a specific taxonomy
  • Usage of Redux framework to give global customizations options : The user can modify aspects of fonts (titles, paragraphs) and choose backgrounds color (footer, container, header).
  • A 3D slider (turntableJs) editable from CMB2 corresponding post metabox
  • On a customizable front page we can enable a slider module, add him images and set options like width, height... Also, we can enable an enchance of posts and pick a one from the list
  • Creation of modules to show specific contents
See the project

Inaprod

Mai 2018 - Juin 2018

A school work involving the creation of a mock communication agency. It's a showcase website inspired by flat design and based on the contents of a planned file. We used various Javascript and jQuery plugins like Isotope, Jquery UI, Aos and Jquery easings. We also create our custom icons pack and used animated SVGs.

See the project

GCCD project (2th part)

February - March 2018

During this project we could get all the contents of the all 3th semester projects. So we achieve a Wordpress website after creation of some prototypes on Adobe XD. The back office uses Redux themes options to give 3 templates pages for specific events and choosing from a list of articles. We also give template pages for new articles and pages with ability to add pictures and videos.

Other several contents like videos, graphics and articles were synthetized to insert web optimized content and SEO friendly. To conclude this project was very rewarding to improve customer relation skills (I talk about trying to explain web development to a person who uses his desktop keyboard very slowly).

See the project

English Stories

March 2018

Blog with Bludit content manager

This website presents an interactive story around the original first page from 'Ghosts', a novel written by Paul Auster in 1983. Bludit CMS gives a simple structure to modulate blog options. I conceive an interactive story algorithm for the stories follow-up choices. Thanks to Bandersnatch for the idea !

See the project

Typescript web game

January 2019

Production of a simple arcade game and based on a Typescript template and Canvas.

This project is based on oriented object programming with usage of keyboard events to control character. I used methods to control character drawing, directions, positions and destruction. Sorry you can't lose...

See the project

Vue js monopage app

April 2019

Creation of a simple e-commerce app. The features are :

  • An index of players with their availability
  • An input form for selling a player
  • Button to add a player to basket
  • A Simple basket system with quantities and progressive remove
See the project

Book of illustrations

November 2018 - December 2018

Created from a word these paintings are touched up with Camera row and Photoshop. The Typographies are customized with Adobe Illustrator and formatted with InDesign.

See the project

GCCD project (1th part)

January 2018

During a week of hard work we've built the 360 degrees communication of the GCCD challenge organized by Grenoble University. The website use the Wordpress CMS to give a custom page template system, customisation options with Redux framework and Youtube videos (API).

Also we create the all contents with an interview of a civil engineering , web articles and a complete graphic charter.
